word:
I consider myself in good health. I shall be 71 next November. The Lord is good. I praise His holy name. During the meeting I have spoken and read important articles four times, and this morning early I go to speak for the last time before returning to Cooranbong.--Letter 59, 1898. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington D. C. Jan. 22, 1988. Entire Letter.
